title: [FEATURE] Make Dispose a virtual method in SKGLView for blazor
body:
Hello Everyone,

SKGLView in blazor implementation has a non-virtual Dispose method, which creates problems when subclassing it. 
Could we have a virtual Dispose method instead?

https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/a863ca3ed6b420a86f7e81afec8eba79dfda495d/source/SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor/SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor/SKGLView.razor.cs#L186-L191

Thank you.
